verbs.description: In a totally unsurprising move , Trump [V: has] appointed Dr. Oz to the President ’s Council on Sports , Fitness , and Nutrition . That ’s a position usually reserved for someone who is known primarily for their celebrity , but it ’s not the norm to name an outright fraud to the council . If you ’ve wondered whatever happened to the snake oil – peddling …
